tool_description: Attributes revenue changes to specific pricing decisions using advanced statistical methods to isolate pricing effects from other factors.

affected_products.description: List of product IDs affected by pricing change

pre_period_days.description: Number of days before pricing event to analyze

post_period_days.description: Number of days after pricing event to analyze

control_products.description: Product IDs to use as control group for comparison

attribution_method.description: Attribution methodology: difference-in-differences, causal-impact, or regression

confidence_level.description: Statistical confidence level for attribution analysis

seasonal_adjustment.description: Whether to apply seasonal adjustment to revenue data

external_factors.description: List of external factors to control for in attribution

error_messages: Invalid pricing event date: Date must be a valid ISO 8601 datetime string and within available data range.
Products not found: One or more product IDs in affected_products do not exist.
Invalid period specification: pre_period_days and post_period_days must be positive integers between 7 and 365.
Invalid attribution method: Must be one of [difference-in-differences, causal-impact, regression].
Invalid confidence level: Must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
Insufficient control group: Control products list is too small for reliable statistical comparison.
Overlapping events: Another pricing event occurred too close to the specified date, affecting attribution accuracy.
usage: Specify pricing_event_date and affected_products, set analysis periods before and after the event. Optionally provide control_products for better causal inference and adjust attribution_method based on data availability.

attributed_revenue_change.description: Revenue change attributed to the pricing decision

attribution_confidence.description: Confidence score for the attribution analysis

statistical_significance.description: Whether the attributed effect is statistically significant

baseline_revenue.description: Expected revenue without the pricing change

actual_revenue.description: Actual revenue after the pricing change

attribution_summary.description: Summary of attribution analysis results and methodology
